channel.title: OpenCV on Yuto's notes
channel.description: Recent content in OpenCV on Yuto's notes

item.title: OpenCV 使用前置攝影機
item.description: import cv2 as cv cam = cv.VideoCapture(0) while True: ret, frame = cam.read() cv.imshow('cam',frame) if cv.waitKey(1)==ord('q'): break cam.release() cv.destroyAllWindows()
